DOC.brief_title: Circle Life . Improving Capacity Swampy Cree Community Members Recognize People Risk Suicide
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : All member Swampy Cree Tribal community currently reside reserve eligible participate study . Exclusion criterion : Exclusion criterion study include less 16 year age , prior training SafeTALK ASIST , elect official First Nations community , inability read write . Primary outcome : Skills Suicide Intervention : Suicide Intervention Response Inventory.The Suicide Intervention Response Inventory ( SIRI ) use detect enhancement intervention skill participant . The SIRI self-administered test design measure competence choose appropriate response series clinical scenario suicidal individual . Research SIRI show good psychometric property , freedom social desirability effect , responsiveness training suicide prevention . It contain 25 item , consist `` client '' remark two `` helper '' response . Responses judge base response option make highly expert suicidologists . The SIRI show good internal consistency alpha 0.834 , good test-retest reliability . Secondary Outcomes : - Knowledge suicide , attitude toward suicide , self-reported preparedness intervene suicidal behavior measure series question develop LivingWorks Inc. - Gatekeeper behavior measure similar question utilized Wyman school-based study assess many people person ask others suicide .
